name: people
description:
Application focusing on having a single point of entry in the form of a `person` to find all related information 
- Users, Companies, Groups, Relations, Systems, Countries

record.name: searchindex
record.description: Search Index is used for concatenating all searchable fields in a single field making in easier to search
